Reviews.Title: A W E S O M E
Reviews.Author: Dennis F Ratcliff
Reviews.Content: This is the best laptop I ever owned!  I added 4gb RAM for 8GB.  It is very fast and I can not find a single CON!  I give this computer 5 stars *****.  I own the S752, Q572, and the M532.

Reviews.Title: Great Choice
Reviews.Author: Abraham guitar
Reviews.Content: Many great features I was looking for: 14" screen, 3rd Gen, capable of handling LOTS of ram (16GB), many removable/replaceable parts. I am running Fedora Linux 64-bit and an SSD and all works great. NOTE: it does not have an HDMI, but the newer DisplayPort standard instead. This laptop is not pretty or sleek and sexy looking; its focus is functionality not fashion.
